overlay-pos.name: Overlay position
overlay-pos.description:
Position of the <cy>in-game overlay</c> that shows the <cg>current ping</c> to the server.

0. Disabled
1. Top left
2. Top right
3. Bottom left
4. Bottom right

overlay-off.name: Overlay offset
overlay-off.description: If you have <cg>another mod</c> that displays some data in the corner, you can try to change this setting to resolve <cr>conflicts</c>. The higher the value, the <cy>closer</c> the overlay is to the <cg>center of the screen</c>.

overlay-hide-dc.name: Only ping overlay
overlay-hide-dc.description: Hides the <cy>in-game ping overlay</c> text whenever you are <cr>disconnected</c> or in a <cj>custom level</c>. Otherwise, replaces it with an appropriate status message.

server-levels-button.name: Server levels button
server-levels-button.description:
Position of the <cg>server levels</c> button on the <cy>level info page</c>.

0. Disabled
1. Left side
2. Top left corner
3. Right side

player-opacity.name: Player opacity
player-opacity.description: Sets opacity of <cy>other players</c>. 0 is <cj>invisible</c>, 255 is <cj>fully opaque</c>.

show-names-dual.name: Player dual name
show-names-dual.description: Show players' <cg>names</c> (and the <cg>checkpoint icon</c> if <cy>Practice icon</c> is <cg>enabled</c>) near their secondary dual icon as well. When turned <cr>off</c>, <cy>only</c> shows the name above the <cj>primary</c> icon.

show-names-offset.name: Name offset
show-names-offset.description: If <cy>Player names</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, the higher the value, the higher will the player's name be rendered above a player's icon.

show-names-scale.name: Name scale
show-names-scale.description: If <cy>Player names</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, this defines the <cg>size</c> of the name.

show-names-opacity.name: Name opacity
show-names-opacity.description: If <cy>Player names</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, this defines the <cg>opacity</c> of the name. 0 is <cj>invisible</c> and 255 is <cj>fully opaque</c>.

show-progress.name: Player progress
show-progress.description: Shows an icon of a player below your <cj>progress bar</c>, indicating how far the player is into the level.

show-progress-self.name: Self progress
show-progress-self.description: Shows your icon under the <cj>progress bar</c> as well, along with other players.

show-progress-altcolor.name: Alt progress color
show-progress-altcolor.description: When toggled, use a player's <cj>primary</c> color instead of the <cg>secondary</c> for displaying the line that indicates their progress in the level when <cy>Player progress</c> is enabled.

show-progress-scale.name: Progress scale
show-progress-scale.description: If <cy>Player progress</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, this defines the <cj>size</c> of the cube icon below the progress bar.

show-progress-offset.name: Progress offset
show-progress-offset.description: If <cy>Player progress</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, higher values will move the <cj>cube icon</c> of every player closer to the <cy>center of the screen</c>.

old-progress.name: Old progress
old-progress.description: Instead of showing an <cj>icon</c> below the <cy>progress bar</c>, show text with arrows at the <cy>edge of your screen</c> indicating where the player is.

show-progress-opacity.name: Old progress opacity
show-progress-opacity.description: If <cy>Old progress</c> is <cg>enabled</c>, this defines the <cg>opacity</c> of the <cy>progress indicator</c>. 0 is <cj>invisible</c> and 255 is <cj>fully opaque</c>.

death-effects.name: Death effects
death-effects.description: Play a <cj>death effect</c> when another player dies. You <cj>may</c> need to restart your game in order to load them.

default-death-effects.name: Default death effect
default-death-effects.description: All players have the <cg>default</c> death effect instead of the one they chose.

practice-icon.name: Player status icons
practice-icon.description: Shows specific icons above player heads if they are in <cg>practice mode</c> or have <cj>paused the game</c>.

name-colors.name: Name colors
name-colors.description: People who helped me or supported me get a <cj>colorful name</c> :D

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.description: This option toggles <cj>debug mode</c>. It is <cr>not recommended</c> to use unless you know the risks. Your game may crash, produce weird behavior, be laggy, or even <cr>corrupt some of your data</c>. You have been warned. Restart the game to see any changes.
